name: Cockatrice
lore: A cockatrice is a hideous, repulsive hybrid that resembles a scrawny rooster with bat wings and a lizard's tail. Its beady eyes and venomous bite can petrify creatures, turning the living to stone. These dim-witted creatures flock together in wild areas, pecking at the ground for sustenance and aggressively attacking anything that startles or provokes them.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have the Restrained condition as it begins to turn to stone. The Restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature has the Petrified condition instead of Restrained.
